sentences.sContent: The geologist found many uncovered fossils in the valley.
sentences.sContent_eng: The geologist found many uncovered fossils in the valley.
sentences.sCn: 在那山谷里，地质学家发现了许多裸露的化石。

sentences.sContent: The power of this tool of the geologist has not been exploited.
sentences.sContent_eng: The power of this tool of the geologist has not been exploited.
sentences.sCn: 地质学家的这种工具的威力尚未得到发挥。

sentences.sContent: Well, replied the guide, a geologist came by here and told me these bones were one hundred million years old, and that was exactly three years ago.
sentences.sContent_eng: Well, replied the guide, a geologist came by here and told me these bones were one hundred million years old, and that was exactly three years ago.
sentences.sCn: 哦，向导回答道，一个地质学家来过这儿，他告诉我说这些化石有十亿年了，再加上那是整整三年前的事了。

remMethod.val: geo(地， 地球) + log(记录) + ist(专家) → 记录地球的专家→ 地质学家
